member.name: INamedPropertyBag.ReadPropertyNPB
member.summary: Causes a property to be read from the named property bag.
member.param: A pointer to a string that contains the name of the property bag.
A pointer to a string that contains the name of the property to be read.
The address of a VARIANT that, when this method returns successfully, receives the property value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INamedPropertyBag.RemovePropertyNPB
member.summary: Removes a property from a named property bag.
member.param: A pointer to a string that contains the name of the property bag from which a property is to be removed.
A pointer to a string that contains the name of the property to remove.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INamedPropertyBag.WritePropertyNPB
member.summary: Saves a property to the named property bag.
member.param: A pointer to a string that contains the name of the property bag.
A pointer to a string that contains the name of the property to write.
A pointer to a VARIANT that holds the new property value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INamedPropertyBag
member.summary: Exposes methods that provide an object with a specified property bag in which the object can save its properties.
